channel.title: Automotive Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Automotive Industry on FinanClub

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:-97 Chances: Rivian has a clear path forward; it just comes down to execution. Rivian’s success as a company is masked by its meme-stock past. Stifel analysts initiated coverage of electric vehicle maker Rivian (RIVN) with a ‘Buy’ rating and a $23 price target this week.

item.title: ON
item.description: score:-45 Chances: ON Semiconductor Corp. is currently receiving positive attention from Wall Street analysts, with recommendations to add it to one’s portfolio. Risks: The global demand for electric vehicles (EVs) has softened, and many EV companies are still losing money, which could impact ON Semiconductor Corp.
